templates.scene: A wagon of turnips has tipped over, and the turnips are rolling toward a sleeping guard.
A flock of opinionated geese blocks the bridge, honking a toll in riddles.
A tiny storm cloud hovers over a single merchant cart, drizzling coins.
An animated broom is sweeping a circle around a glowing pebble.
A bandit troupe is rehearsing an apology song on the roadside.
A courier fox demands a signature on a letter sealed with moss.
A pond is bubbling with laughter. Something under the surface tells jokes.
Festival lanterns drift the wrong direction, luring a crowd away.
A statue has stepped down to stretch. It asks for a quick story.
The wind delivers a scarf with an embroidered warning.
